title: Fresh: Mastodon Streaming New Single 'Andromeda' [News]
text:
Posted 7 hours ago 27 
Mastodon are officially streaming "Andromeda" as the latest single off their upcoming seventh album "Emperor of Sand," due out on March 31. 
Bassist/vocalist Troy Sanders previously described this one as Bill Kelliher's highlight on the album, saying: 
"Easily, my Bill Kelliher highlight of the album is a song called 'Andromeda.' Right when he was demoing this out, it immediately reminded me of one of our favorite bands of all time - Burnt By the Sun, I immediately fell in love with it. 
"Heavy as two hells, the sickest, dirtiest riff in a long time. 'Andromeda' - tough as nails, thick as elephant skin, it's fantastic. That's my Bill Kelliher highlight riff of the album. It really blossoms into a song that wasn't pure heaviness - kind of goes off into these slightly trippy verses." 
The track awaits below, along with two previously premiered singles - " Sultan's Curse " and " Show Yourself ."
